  1. Here @eleven_ty’s eleventy-img uses @sindresorhus’ capture-website to take one screenshot of netlify.com and generates six images from it for use later in <picture>: 2560×1600: * 264 KB PNG * 234 KB JPEG * 39KB AVIF 600×375: * 94 KB PNG * 33 KB JPEG * 14 KB AVIF
    On twitter.com ♻️ 5 Retweets ❤️ 63 Favorites 2020 Dec 8 Mood 0
